relating to a troposphere of a planet (= the lowest part of its atmosphere), or to the troposphere of the earth (= the layer of gases surrounding it from its surface up to a height of about ten kilometres): Tropospheric ozone is a by-product of fossil fuel combustion and a major contributor to smog in cities.
